text.2: to join their team out of NYC.

strong: **This opening is a 6 month contract, with the opportunity for extension or conversion**

p.6: In this role, you would be responsible for improve on the quality of content takedowns. You will proactively moderating the entire catalog and elevate dangerous content quickly and efficiently to reviewers and automatic takedown processes.

li: Work with a data pipeline and BigQuery dataset to elevate dangerous content to downstream consumers
li.1: Help improve on our existing logic to elevate dangerous content.
li.2: Focused on both precision and recall, versioning logic, and improving the feedback loop into the system
li.3: Expand to further projects related to content moderation

li.2: Strong experience with SQL, Python, or R
li.3: Knowledge of Google=E2=80=99s BigQuery is a plus

p.16: Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future.
